reuters.title: STOLTENBERG NOT SURPRISED BY DOLLAR REACTION
reuters.body: West German Finance Minister Gerhard Stoltenberg said he was not surprised by the overnight decline of the dollar in foreign exchange markets. Speaking briefly with reporters before entering a meeting of the International Monetary Fund he said, "These minor movements don't really affect us." The dollar declined in the initial reaction to a statement by the Group of Seven industrial countries reaffirming their Paris agreement in February to maintain their currencies around current levels. Reuter 
